channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Green telecomms cabinet, prolific silver spray tag at jct of Lawrie Park Road and Crystal Palace Park Rd, Penge., 28th January
item.description:
Green telecomms cabinet, prolific silver spray tag at jct of Lawrie Park Road and Crystal Palace Park Rd, Penge. Seen Sunday 25/1/26 from moving vehicle hence Streetview archive location image here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Lawrie Park Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed bugs, 28th January
item.description:
14a Vicarage Grove have left bug bed and wood mites infested furniture outside of their house for over a week. They left furniture outside of neighbours houses too and had to be asked to move it because it was blocking the entrance to peoples houses. Its a public heath risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Grove, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamppost not working anymore, 28th January
item.description:
This lamppost has not been turning on at night for the past 2days. The alleyway is now very dark and with a history of crime and anti-social behaviour in this alleyway this issue needs to be addressed immediately. I no longer feel safe walking home at night. The lamppost is in the alleyway adjoining Landsdown Gardens just behind Thorne road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thorne Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping next to Screwfix car park on Merrow Street, 28th January
item.description:
More flytipping at the corner of the Screwfix car park on Merrow Street. The flytipping keeps occurring and this pile looks like it includes broken bits of wood and similar which are right on the pedestrian pavement. The flytipping situation seems to be getting worse in the area so would be good to see it addressed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Merrow Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous illegal parking, 28th January
item.description:
All times day & night illegal parking on double yellow lines and pavement limiting vision and access into & out of Bastion Road .SE2. This is escalating after dark ,night time. This junction is an accident waiting to happen. Reported several times to GREENWICH COUNCIL.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bostall Hill, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of road to 163, 28th January
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from number 163 two green painted metal boxes both graffiti tagged – not BT design as far a I am aware. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for reporting pin &, picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from 13 Sydcote, 28th January
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road from number 13 Sydcote (which is next to 163 Rosendale Rd) green painted metal box graffiti tagged – not BT design as far a I am aware. item.title: Dangerous pothole, 28th January
item.description:
‘A stitch in time saves nine.’ This road surface is rapidly wearing away exposing the metal drain cover and posing a serious risk to motorists driving down Leesons Hill. Please repair it as soon as possible to avoid it worsening. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 195, Leesons Hill, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
